# File gm_plugin/map.rb, line 135
      def center_zoom_on_points_init(*points)
        if(points.length > 0)
          if(points[0].is_a?(Array))
            points = points.collect { |point| GLatLng.new(point) }
          end
          @init_begin << center_and_zoom_on_points(points)
        end
      end
